title: Ninja Slushi Machine With Box Frozen Drink Maker
description: Ninja Slushi Machine with original box, in excellent condition. Easily create refreshing frozen drinks, slushies, and smoothies at home. Features powerful blending performance, multiple speed settings, and dishwasher-safe parts for easy cleaning. Compact design makes it perfect for kitchens, parties, or special events. Ready to use right out of the box.
